name: Kale, Swiss Chard, Chicken, and Feta Salad
author: Bettebet
summary: Delicious salad! You can use lemon juice in place of the cider vinegar. Also can use Gorgonzola or shaved Parmesan cheese in place or in addition to feta!
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, torn into bite-sized pieces
1 bunch Swiss chard, torn into bite-sized pieces
1 pound grilled skinless, boneless chicken breast, sliced
1 (6 ounce) container crumbled feta cheese, or more to taste
directions: Whisk the vinegar, honey, salt, pepper, and oregano in a bowl until the honey has dissolved
Whisk in the olive oil until evenly blended
Place the kale, Swiss chard, chicken, feta cheese, raisins, and walnuts into a bowl
Toss with the dressing to serve
